#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const double eps = 1e-9;
void sol() {
  int n, m; scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
  vector<int> val(n), wei(n);
  vector<double> x(n);
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
    scanf("%d%d", &val[i], &wei[i]);
  }
  double left = 0, right = 100000;
  for (int _ = 0; _ < 100; ++_) {
    double mid = (left + right) * 0.5;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) x[i] = val[i] - mid * wei[i];
    sort(x.begin(), x.end(), greater<double>());
    double sum(0);
    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) sum += x[i];
    if (sum >= eps) left = mid;
    else right = mid;
  }
  printf("%.10f\n", left);
}

int main() {
  int T; scanf("%d", &T);
  for (int i = 0; i < T; ++i) {
    sol();
  }
  return 0;
}
